document.full_text: detroit tigers second baseman carlos guillen and relief pitcher joel zumaya will begin major league baseball's season on the disabled list because of injuries, the team said tuesday.
document.title: tigers to start season without injured guillen, zumaya
lines_and_colors: detroit tigers second baseman carlos guillen and relief pitcher joel zumaya will begin major league baseball's season on the disabled list because of injuries, the team said tuesday.
